name: PETG Translucent - Qidi Q2 Advanced
description: Optimized PETG-Translucent profile for Qidi Q2 2025 with hardened steel nozzle. Tuned for clarity, minimal stringing, and strong layer adhesion.

temperature.comment: Hardened steel nozzle needs +5-10C vs brass. 240C ensures full melt for translucent clarity. Low chamber avoids PETG heat creep.

speed.comment: Conservative outer wall (50mm/s) for translucent surface quality — faster speeds show layer lines more in clear PETG. Slow bridges prevent sag.

retraction.comment: Qidi Q2 direct drive = short retraction (0.8mm). Slow deretraction (25mm/s) prevents PETG blobs. Wipe + retract-before-wipe combo eliminates stringing.

cooling.comment: 40-70% fan is the PETG sweet spot: enough to solidify overhangs, not so much that layer bonding suffers. No fan first 3 layers for bed adhesion.

flow.comment: 0.98 flow ratio — PETG tends to over-extrude slightly. Dial in with a single-wall flow test cube if needed.

quality.comment: Overhang detection slows down on steep faces to reduce sag. Crossing-wall avoidance + selective retraction cuts stringing.

adhesion.comment: Auto-brim adds brim only when needed. PETG usually sticks well at 80C bed.

multi_color_ams.comment: Prime tower collects purge on filament changes. Flush into infill reduces waste. Ready for AMS when it arrives.

print_orientation_notes.lid: Flat side down (recessed panel faces up)
print_orientation_notes.dragon_knob: Base-down, may need tree supports for horns
print_orientation_notes.corner_accents: Vertical (L-shape at bottom), print all 4 on one plate
print_orientation_notes.claw_feet: Pad-down (flat base on build plate), print all 4 on one plate

tuning_tips.stringing_test: Print a retraction tower — adjust retraction_length 0.6-1.0mm
tuning_tips.flow_calibration: Single-wall cube: measure wall with calipers, target 0.45mm
tuning_tips.temp_tower: Print a temp tower 230-250C, pick the floor with best clarity + no blobs
tuning_tips.bed_adhesion: If lifting, bump initial bed temp to 90C or add glue stick
tuning_tips.transparency: For maximum clarity: 0.12mm layer height, 35mm/s outer wall, 0.96 flow
